name: Orbimesh Groq Compound Agent
description: A powerful research agent that uses Groq's compound-beta model to perform real-time web searches and provide summarized, cited answers.

endpoints.description: Perform a web search and get a summarized answer with citations. Use for research questions like 'What are the latest developments in AI?', 'Explain quantum computing', 'Recent breakthroughs in medicine'.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The question or topic to search for and summarize.
